core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Logistics Precision with Cyberpunk Aesthetics
Content is King: Data Density with Visual Clarity
Contrast: High-contrast neon against deep matte backgrounds
anti_patterns: No pure black (#000000) backgrounds - use tinted dark greys
No 'Inter' font for headings - use character-rich fonts
No gradients on text unless for specific emphasis

usage_rules: Use Primary (#6366f1) for main actions and active states
Use Secondary (#f59e0b) for 'In Transit' or 'Pending' states

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-transparent hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-md px-4 py-2

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary focus:border-transparent rounded-md h-10 px-3

tables.header: bg-surface_highlight text-muted-foreground text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-bold

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/40 border-b border-white/10 (Use for Sticky Header)
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients for dashboard background highlights (e.g., top-right glow)
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to reduce digital flatness

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SET UP RTL: Ensure the root html tag has dir='rtl' and class='dark'.
2. INSTALL FONTS: Add Manrope and IBM Plex Sans Arabic via Google Fonts.
3. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom color palette and font families.
4. BUILD LAYOUT: Create a persistent Layout component with a Right Sidebar and Top Header.
5. IMPLEMENT DASHBOARD: Use the Bento Grid strategy for the main dashboard widgets.
6. USE SHADCN: Customize Shadcn components (Card, Table, Button, Input) to match the 'Dark Mode Logistics' aesthetic.
7. MOCK DATA: Create a robust mock data file for Users, Drivers, and Orders to populate the UI immediately.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
